Water Pollution; 46% of Rivers Unsafe for Bathing
Of the 311 monitored river stretches; 143 (46%) were found unfit for bathing or agricultural use due to high levels of Biochemical Oxygen Demand (BOD) and Fecal Coliform bacteria
